ygData.subject: Re: Best wizard equipment ! !   SPOILER
ygData.msgSnippet: Mark, I m on Rallos Zek... If you tell me where to get the stone, I ll let you in on a secret as to how and why wizards can be the fastest leveling classes in
ygData.messageBody:
Mark,

I'm on Rallos Zek... If you tell me where to get the stone, I'll let you in
on a secret as to how and why wizards can be the fastest leveling classes in
the game with a tiny bit of help and sometimes none at all. Also I would
expect you to keep this secret as i don't want too many people to know about
it yet and have other classes complain that we are too powerful(When played
right, we are very, very powerful). Thanks.

James
Euros Arcane - lvl 27 wiz - Rallos Zek
